replies.body: Yeah, this happens sometimes. have you tried to log on again after that?

replies.body:
It's a glitch. It basically consists on old infractions kicking you off the server for being afk a couple of minutes.
Devs are working on this so don't worry.
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body:
This happens to many players; not just you.

It does not go on your infractions list again, so don't worry about that.

Hopefully we'll get this fixed in the nearby future.
